title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Ladies Spring Conference
description: The Ladies Spring Conference will be held at Grace Bible Church in Bozeman. The theme is 'The Priorities of a Godly Woman', with Dr. Vanessa Ellen speaking.

title: Ladies Morning Bible Study - Elijah
description: Ladies! Join us for our last morning Bible study before summer. We will be doing a six-week study on Elijah with Melissa Spoelstra as the DVD teacher from March 19th through April 30th. Books need to be ordered soon, so please call or text Louisa or the church office to be put on the list.

title: Nursery Parents Meeting
description: A brief introductory meeting for parents of nursery and preschool-aged children to meet the new nursery directors will be held following the morning service.

title: Communion Sunday
description: Be preparing your hearts to receive communion this Sunday, March 9th.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: This Sunday, March 9th, we have the opportunity to minister to the residents at BVLC. Please come and worship with these dear people at 2:30PM at BVLC.

title: Calling Artists & Crafters
description: Bring your current projects, materials, and tools to join in a time of creating and community! Observers are welcome to come for fellowship also! In the Fellowship Hall, 11:00AM to 2:00PM, lunch will be served.
